# Wartule

Wartule  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Stary Dzierzgoń, within Sztum County, Pomeranian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  west of Stary Dzierzgoń,  east of Sztum, and  south-east of the regional capital Gdańsk.
For the history of the region, see History of Pomerania.
